headline.main: FOGGIA IS BOMBED FROM NORTH AFRICA; Flying Fortresses Make Their First Raid on Italian City Near Adriatic Coast FOGGIA IS BOMBED FROM NORTH AFRICA

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, June 1 -- The shattering weight of the great American air offensive was directed against the Italian mainland again yesterday, when strong formations of Flying Fortresses wrecked the airdrome and freight yards at Foggia, eighty miles northwest of Naples and 440 miles from Tunis.
abstract: Flying Fortresses bomb Foggia; Allied aerial offensive discussed; Sardinia and Pantelleria raided; Middle East fighters active; Itals admit heavy damage, Foggia
snippet: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, June 1 -- The shattering weight of the great American air offensive was directed against the Italian mainland again yesterday, when strong formations of Flying Fortresses wrecked the airdrome and freight yards ...

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
